item.description:
Russian Storytime for Families
Speaker: Katie Green, Storyteller
Time: 7:00 p.m.
Date: 07-16-2008
Description:
Hear about Ivan and the Firebird and meet the famous Russian witch BabaYaga with award-winning storyteller Katie Green. Katie Green has traveled in Russia and brings these colorful characters to life in this performance for adults and older children. Storyteller Katie Green lives in Princeton, MA, and travels throughout New England and beyond telling stories and leading workshops. "Traveling in Russia made the Russian folktales more vibrant for me," Katie says. She participated in the Furst Russian Folk and Dance Festival in Yaroslavl in 1992, and has been performing Russian stories for audiences of all ages since then. Last March, Katie performed Russian folktales with the Newton Symphony Orchestra. Her recordings and book are available on her website, www.katiegreenstories.com.

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Russian Storytime for Families @ The Museum of Russian Icons
